DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify the genetic makeup of cancers, the cancer response, and the correlation of the cancer response to standardized regimens of cancer treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Tumor Phenotypes and Correlation to Clinical Outcomes in Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: To identify the genetic makeup of cancers, the cancer response, and the correlation of the cancer response to standardized regimens of cancer treatment.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of cancer receiving chemotherapy Have had or will have tissue and/or blood samples collected
